summary:
This mod removes cairns from the world. It is designed for people that
like to discover things on their own.

I felt that Bethesda added cairns as a way of saying \"Hey, look over
here. There is something cool to do.\". This mod attempts to correct
that.
descriptionHtml:
This mod removes cairns from the world. It is designed for people that
like to discover things on their own.

I felt that Bethesda added cairns as a way of saying \"Hey, look over
here. There is something cool to do.\". This mod attempts to correct
that.

This mod is for people that like to use bShowCompass=0 and 
bShowQuestMarkers=0 in the INI file.

Note: I am a hiker, I realize what cairns are used for in real life. However,
very early in the game, I found them leading right to cave entrances that
I wouldn\'t have discovered if I hadn\'t seen the cairn. I don\'twant the game
leading me around by the nose, that is why I play with the compass 
turned off.
author: Silverglade
